description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Win32k elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-20683), the following updates should be applied:

1. Download and install the relevant security updates for your system from the Microsoft Update Catalog.
   - KB-5034123: Windows 11 version 23H2 for x64-based systems
   - KB-5034134: Windows 10 for x64-based systems
   - KB-5034119: Windows Server 2016
   - Other applicable KBs based on your operating system version.

2. After installation, restart your system to enforce the updates.

**Details**:
- The updates mitigate the risk of elevation of privilege by addressing vulnerabilities in the Win32k component. 
- For manual installation, download the corresponding update packages from the following links:
   - [KB-5034123](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034123)
   - [KB-5034134](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034134)
   - [KB-5034119](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034119)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is running one of the supported versions outlined in the post.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installations.
